questions.question:
What do you want to talk about? I’ve got degrees 🎓🤓 in these subjects: 
 (1) Are you ready to vote? ✉️ 
 (2) What new laws mean for you 👀 
 Enter a number!

 (1) Yes 
 (2) No or I'm not sure!

Do you have any of these forms of ID? (1) Yes (2) No

Prepare to become a voting virtuoso!
